title: Technical Reference Documentation for Block Types
description: This documentation provides an overview of the BlockType union and Block interface, detailing the structure of content blocks in documents.
author: Documentation Team

blocks.content: This documentation defines the BlockType union and Block interface, which are essential for creating structured content blocks in documents.
The Block interface allows for flexible content structuring, enabling various types of content to be represented.
Understanding the BlockType union and Block interface is crucial for developers working with structured content in documents.
